author: Predeactor
description: Cogs made for Red, created by the Captain'!
install_msg:
Thank for adding my repository to your bot!

Any bugs you can found can be reported to my repo (https://github.com/Predeactor/Predeactor-Cogs).
If you need support, you can go to my support server: https://discord.gg/zg6ydua.

Otherwise, enjoy my cogs!
